body_html: Both fields of sp_ids are useful. It is assumed that sp_weights is "aligned" with sp_ids in the sense that sp_ids.indices == sp_weights.indices. Only sp_ids.indices[:, 0] (the first dimension) is used.
body_text: Both fields of sp_ids are useful. It is assumed that sp_weights is "aligned" with sp_ids in the sense that sp_ids.indices == sp_weights.indices. Only sp_ids.indices[:, 0] (the first dimension) is used.
body: Both fields of `sp_ids` are useful. It is assumed that `sp_weights` is "aligned" with `sp_ids` in the sense that `sp_ids.indices == sp_weights.indices`. Only `sp_ids.indices[:, 0]` (the first dimension) is used.
